alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Hale; Swisher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 6:59PM CDT until May 23 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Floyd County in northwestern Texas... Northeastern Hale County in northwestern Texas... South central Swisher County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 658 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southeast of Kress, or 8 miles north of Plainview, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Plainview and Seth Ward. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
